channel.title: Articles on Derek McKnight
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Derek McKnight

item.title: Ansible and Configuration Management: The truth
item.description: Cityscape where the blood of good men courses And the dreamers are bull trapped in porcelain Take a knee to the gods and get horse shit Wanna live for the thrill? They’ll arrange it Got a bevy of imps to spit hatred Shit’ll get in your head and cause panic Have you desperately begging to get famous Get your dignity dirty and left orphaned Sanity on the fringe of distorted Who are they to just take shit and hoard it?
